question:
The Integrated Fusion Centre of Indian Ocean Region had commenced operation in early October. In this context, consider the following statements :
  1. It involves cooperation with other countries. 
  2. The centre will deal with white shipping.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The maritime information sharing hub of India, the Information Fusion Centre- Indian Ocean Region commenced operations in October. IFC interacts with the maritime community to build comprehensive data. It has ties with 18 countries and also 15 maritime and multinational security centres. Statement 2 is correct: The IFC-IOR deals with white shipping. The white shipping is term that refers to non-military commercial maritime vessels’ activity. The IFC collects real-time data on white shipping traffic. It will also exchange information with the other countries to make IOR safer.
